overview:
Mike Lunsford is the EVP of Technology Products and Solutions and Media Software and Services divisions at Real Networks. He also oversees Rhapsody America, the company’s digital music joint venture with MTV Networks.
In his prior role as executive vice president of strategic ventures, Mr. Lunsford was responsible for directing the strategy and operations for Rhapsody America. Before joining Real in 2008, Mr. Lunsford held a number of senior roles over eight years at EarthLink, Inc. (Nasdaq: ELNK), including interim president and CEO. Mr. Lunsford also served on the Board of Directors of Helio, a joint venture between EarthLink and SK Telecom.

relationships.title: Executive Vice President, Music, Media, Tech. Solutions
